metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Test your React skills with exercises from all categories:
content.html: Test your React skills with exercises from all categories:

content.text: Log in to track your progress
If you haven't already, sign up to become a W3Schooler, and get points for every exercise you complete.
content.html: If you haven't already, sign up to become a W3Schooler, and get points for every exercise you complete.

content.text: As a logged on W3Schools user you will have access to many features like having your own web page , track your learning progress , receive personal guided paths , and more .
content.html: As a logged on W3Schools user you will have access to many features like having your own web page, track your learning progress, receive personal guided paths, and more.

content.text: We have gathered a variety of React exercises from most of the chapters in our React Tutorial .
content.html: We have gathered a variety of React exercises from most of the chapters in our React Tutorial.

content.text: The exercises are a mix of "multiple choice" and "fill in the blanks" questions. The answer can be found in the corresponding tutorial chapter. If you're stuck, or answer wrong, you can try again or hit the "Show Answer" button to see the correct answer.
content.html: The exercises are a mix of "multiple choice" and "fill in the blanks" questions. The answer can be found in the corresponding tutorial chapter. If you're stuck, or answer wrong, you can try again or hit the "Show Answer" button to see the correct answer.
